vote.title: Authorize a ratification of an emergency procurement pursuant to Chapter XXII, Section 4, City Charter; Section 252.002, Texas Local Government Code and Section 10.5.2 of AD 4-5, and reimbursement agreement with the Dallas Museum of Art for reimbursement for professional de-installation, moving, offsite storage, and reinstallation of artwork in the Reeves Galleries of the Dallas Museum of Art to enable facilities repair following the 2022 Severe Weather and Flooding event for the term beginning September 1, 2022 - Not to exceed $595,700.00 - Financing: 2022 Severe Weather and Flooding Fund
vote.description: Authorize a ratification of an emergency procurement pursuant to Chapter XXII, Section 4, City Charter; Section 252.002, Texas Local Government Code and Section 10.5.2 of AD 4-5, and reimbursement agreement with the Dallas Museum of Art for reimbursement for professional de-installation, moving, offsite storage, and reinstallation of artwork in the Reeves Galleries of the Dallas Museum of Art to enable facilities repair following the 2022 Severe Weather and Flooding event for the term beginning September 1, 2022 - Not to exceed $595,700.00 - Financing: 2022 Severe Weather and Flooding Fund
